metadata.title: Bella+Canvas Men's Comfortable V-Neck Soft Fitted Jersey T-Shirt
features: solid colors: 30-single 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (4.2 oz.)
athletic heather: 30-single 90% combed and ring-spun cotton/10% polyester (4.2 oz.)
all other heather colors: 30-single 52% combed and ring-spun cotton/48% polyester (4.2 oz.)
neon colors: 40-single 52% combed and ring-spun cotton/48% polyester (3.6 oz.)
description: This BELLA+CANVAS updated unisex essential fits like a well-loved favorite, featuring a classic V-neck, short sleeves and superior combed and ring-spun cotton that acts as the best blank canvas for printing. Available in a variety of solid, marble, neon, and heather colors. solid colors: 30-single 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (4.2 oz.), ash: 30-single 99% combed and ring-spun cotton/1% polyester (4.2 oz.), athletic heather: 30-single 90% combed and ring-spun cotton/10% polyester (4.2 oz.), all other heather colors: 30-single 52% combed and ring-spun cotton/48% polyester (4.2 oz.), marble colors: 30-single 91% polyester/9% combed and ring-spun cotton (4 oz.), mineral wash colors*: 32-single 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (4.4 oz.), neon colors: 40-single 52% combed and ring-spun cotton/48% polyester (3.6 oz.).
